function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of effective contact tracing","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases, higher morbidity and mortality rates","Mitigation":"Develop and implement digital contact tracing solutions, increase public health measures","Technologies":"Tracking apps, mobile phones, wearables, computational methods","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Data privacy concerns","Impact":"Loss of public trust, potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Adherence to data privacy regulations, transparent data collection and handling practices","Technologies":"Secure data encryption, privacy-preserving technologies","People":"General public, researchers, developers","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Lack of empirical studies evaluating the effectiveness of digital contact tracing","Impact":"Inability to assess the performance of digital solutions, uncertainty about their effectiveness","Mitigation":"Conduct empirical studies to evaluate digital solutions, establish standards for effectiveness assessment","Technologies":"Research methodologies, data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
